mapper.select: SELECT * FROM festival as f1 join festival_address as f2 on f1.festival_name = f2.festival_name WHERE MONTH(CURDATE()) BETWEEN MONTH(festival_startdate) AND MONTH(festival_enddate);

SELECT * FROM festival as f1 JOIN festival_address as f2 ON f1.festival_name = f2.festival_name WHERE MONTH(CURDATE()) BETWEEN MONTH(festival_startdate) AND MONTH(festival_enddate) AND f1.festival_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{festival_address}, '%');

SELECT f.festival_name, f.festival_address, COUNT(fl.festival_name) AS festival_like_count FROM festival f JOIN festival_like fl ON f.festival_name = fl.festival_name GROUP BY f.festival_name, f.festival_address HAVING COUNT(fl.festival_name) > 0 UNION SELECT f.festival_name, f.festival_address, 0 AS festival_like_count FROM festival f WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM festival_like fl WHERE fl.festival_name = f.festival_name ) ORDER BY festival_like_count DESC limit 8
select a.festival_name, a.FESTIVAL_ADDRESS from festival a WHERE CURDATE() BETWEEN festival_startdate AND festival_enddate order by rand() limit 8;

select * from festival as f1 join festival_address as f2 on f1.festival_name = f2.FESTIVAL_NAME join festival_insta as f3 on f1.festival_name = f3.FESTIVAL_NAME join festival_fee as f4 on f1.festival_name = f4.festival_name where f1.festival_name = #{festival_name}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM festival_like a WHERE a.festival_name = #{festival_name} AND a.member_id = #{member_id}
